# Calendar & Key Dates  
```{r}

library(kableExtra)
library(tidyverse)

calendar <- read_csv("./schedule.csv") %>% 
  mutate(WEEK=paste(Week1,WEEK,sep=" ")) %>% 
  select(-block,-Week1) %>% 
  mutate(DATE=paste(Day,Month,sep="-")) %>% 
  # mutate(SESSION=as.character(SESSION)) %>% 
  select(WEEK,DATE,TOPIC, `ASSIGNMENT INFO`=`ASSIGNMENT DISTRIBUTED or DUE`) %>% 
  # select(WEEK,SESSION,DATE,TOPIC, `ASSIGNMENT INFO`=`ASSIGNMENT DISTRIBUTED or DUE`) %>% 
  replace_na(list(DATE="",WEEK="", TOPIC="", `ASSIGNMENT INFO`="")) %>% 
  mutate(WEEK = gsub("NA NA","", WEEK)) %>% 
  mutate(WEEK = gsub("Finals Week NA","Finals Week", WEEK))
```
